page.title: 11CHELTENHAM GENERAL HOSPITAL
page.content: Cheltenham General Hospital was built in 1848.It has 317 beds,11 wards,a Day Unit and an Intensive Care Unit.It has 1714 staff which consists of 55 consultants,40 doctors,135 admin and clerical staff,270 nurses,205 professional and technical staff and 246 ancillary staff.The number of in_ patients in the period 1/1/84 to 31/12/84 was 11,372.The number of out_ patients seen was 100,485,including 20,342 new attendances.The cost of a patient staying in the hospital for an average of 8 days is Â£625.The populatio served is approximately 205,000.As the hospital in Cheltenham is a general hospital,any patient who requires specialist treatment is transferred to Bristol.The only department at Cheltenham which can be called specialist is the Radiotherapy Centre.Some new buildings are planned.
